query:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS image_comparisons (
  id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  user_id INT NOT NULL,
  before_image_id INT NOT NULL,
  after_image_id INT NOT NULL,
  comparison_type ENUM('quality_improvement', 'defect_fix', 'process_change', 'before_after') DEFAULT 'before_after' NOT NULL,
  product_code VARCHAR(100),
  production_line_id INT,
  ai_comparison_result JSON,
  improvement_score DECIMAL(5,2),
  before_score DECIMAL(5,2),
  after_score DECIMAL(5,2),
  summary TEXT,
  recommendations JSON,
  status ENUM('pending', 'analyzing', 'completed', 'failed') DEFAULT 'pending' NOT NULL,
  notes TEXT,
  created_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  updated_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  INDEX idx_comparisons_user (user_id),
  INDEX idx_comparisons_product (product_code),
  INDEX idx_comparisons_status (status),
  INDEX idx_comparisons_created (created_at)
)
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 2bBfAdpTc8yvngq.root --database RpnsLdN3u3f6PBDr9mn7Zq --execute CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS image_comparisons (
  id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  user_id INT NOT NULL,
  before_image_id INT NOT NULL,
  after_image_id INT NOT NULL,
  comparison_type ENUM('quality_improvement', 'defect_fix', 'process_change', 'before_after') DEFAULT 'before_after' NOT NULL,
  product_code VARCHAR(100),
  production_line_id INT,
  ai_comparison_result JSON,
  improvement_score DECIMAL(5,2),
  before_score DECIMAL(5,2),
  after_score DECIMAL(5,2),
  summary TEXT,
  recommendations JSON,
  status ENUM('pending', 'analyzing', 'completed', 'failed') DEFAULT 'pending' NOT NULL,
  notes TEXT,
  created_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  updated_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  INDEX idx_comparisons_user (user_id),
  INDEX idx_comparisons_product (product_code),
  INDEX idx_comparisons_status (status),
  INDEX idx_comparisons_created (created_at)
)
